script:
if not exist "C:\Space\" mkdir "c:\Space\"
if not exist "C:\Space\!My Files" mkdir "c:\Space\!My Files\"
rmdir "C:\Space\Legacy Files" /S /Q
rmdir "C:\Space\Scripts\NEW PRODUCTS & 2B" /S /Q
rmdir "C:\Space\Data" /S /Q

rem robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Database" C:\Space\Database /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
rmdir "C:\Space\Database"
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\!Staging\Database" C:\Space\Database /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
@echo off

pause
exit
